ingredients.ingredient: ¼ teaspoon poultry seasoning salt, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) bottle Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

cookingTips: Pat wings dry before seasoning for better spice adhesion and crisping
Grill over medium heat, turning frequently to prevent burning and ensure even cooking
Toss with sauce and melted butter in the last few minutes of grilling for coating without burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on proper grill temperature and the timing for adding sauce to achieve caramelized, spicy wings.
